original: Hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—hīnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā.
analyzed: hīnam dhammam paṭicca hīnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccaya ahīnam ekam khandham paṭicca tayaḥ khandhāḥ pe dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhāḥ

original: Hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—hīne khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
analyzed: hīnam dhammam paṭicca majjhimaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā ahīne khandhe paṭicca citta samuṭṭhānam rūpa

original: Hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hīno ca majjhimo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—hīnaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe….
analyzed: hīnam dhammam paṭicca hīnaḥ ca majjhimaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccaya ahīnam ekam khandham paṭicca tayaḥ khandhāḥ citta samuṭṭhānañca rūpam pe dve khandhe pe

original: Majjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—majjhimaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
analyzed: majjhimam dhammam paṭicca majjhimaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā majjhimam ekam khandha

original: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… dve khandhe …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
analyzed: paṭicca tayo khandhā citta samuṭṭhānam ca rūpam pe dve khandhe pe paṭisandhi kkhaṇe

original: …pe… khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṁ paṭicca khandhā; ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ …pe… mahābhūte
analyzed: pe khandhe paṭicca vatthu vatthum paṭicca khandhāḥ ekam mahābhūtam pe mahābhūte
paṭicca citta samuṭṭhānam rūpam kaṭattā rūpam upādā rūpam

original: Paṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: paṇītam dhammam paṭicca paṇītaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Majjhimañca paṇītañca dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— paṇīte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
analyzed: majjhimam ca paṇītam ca dhammam paṭicca majjhimaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā paṇīte khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca citta samuṭṭhānam rūpa

original: Hīnañca majjhimañca dhammaṁ paṭicca majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— hīne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
analyzed: hīnam ca majjhimam ca dhammam paṭicca majjhimaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hīne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca citta samuṭṭhānam rūpa
hīna ttikam saṅkiliṭṭha ttika sadisam vitthāretabbam paripuṇṇa
